trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateActivity represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or StateActivity classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 상태 활동에는 하나 이상 포함 될 수 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, 또는 StateActivity 클래스, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>클래스 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity>클래스</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> 하나의</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: SetState 활동 내에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>워크플로 상태를 이동 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>

trans-unit.source: When a StateActivity is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the StateActivity and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing StateActivity activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: 받을 수 있는 유일한 이벤트는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>StateActivity와도는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>바깥쪽 StateActivity 활동 및 루트 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> 에 연결 된 활동에서</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 활동</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 에 의해 처리 될 수 있는 이벤트는 StateActivity를 실행할 때

trans-unit.source: When the StateActivity starts running, the StateActivity will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
trans-unit.target: 경우 실행 StateActivity 되기 시작 StateActivity 확인 하 게 여부는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>활동 없거나.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.

As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the StateActivity blocks events so that the StateActivity only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: 즉시는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>활동이 완료 되 면 StateActivity 블록 이벤트 StateActivity만 처리할 수 있는 이벤트를 받을 수 있도록 해당 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>활동.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the StateActivity activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: StateActivity는는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, 즉 StateActivity 활동 다른 활동을 포함할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> 클래스 활동의 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Cancels the execution of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The execution context for the activity.
The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 상태는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> 실행 중인 워크플로 인스턴스의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
The execution context for the activity.
The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 상태는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> 실행 중인 워크플로 인스턴스의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: 실행 인스턴스를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> 지정한 자식 활동 이름에 해당 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
The dynamic child activities.
The executable activities do not contain the childActivityName.
trans-unit.target: 실행 가능한 활동을 포함 하지 않습니다는 childActivityName 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the service provider.
trans-unit.target: 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> 서비스 공급자를 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
Determines if the activity being added is an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 추가 중인 작업 인지 여부를 확인 한 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> 그렇다면 새로 추가 된 이벤트 구동을 구독 해야 하는지 여부를 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 사용자에 자식을 추가할 때마다 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>워크플로 변경을 통해.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 CompositeActivity에 정의 되 고 추가 중인 작업 인지 확인 하기 StateActivity에 의해 재정의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>그렇다면 새로 추가 된 이벤트 구동을 구독 해야 하는 경우를 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
The activity added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 전환의 일부로 워크플로 런타임 엔진에 의해 호출 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: 변경 추적 데이터 키의 문자열 값 "StateActivity.StateChange"입니다.

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
To be added.
